main event: Two irregularly shaped yellowish objects were observed flying west, approximately 100 yards apart, emitting flashing lights and vapor.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for about 3 minutes., The objects were irregularly shaped and yellowish in color., The lights on the objects were flashing., There was vapor spurting from the sides of the objects., The observer had previously seen similar incidents at the same location.
witness description: one unidentified observer with prior sightings
